required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Effect of Sevelamer Carbonate on Serum Trimethylamine-n-Oxide (TMAO) Level in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Stage 3b-4
clinical_study.official_title: The Effect of Sevelamer Carbonate on Serum Trimethylamine-n-Oxide (TMAO) Level in Patients With Chronic Kidney Disease (CKD) Stage 3b-4: a Protocol of a Randomized, Parallel, Controlled Trial
clinical_study.source: Nanfang Hospital of Southern Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to investigate effects of sevelamer carbonate on reducing TMAO in stage 3b-4 CKD (pre-dialysis) patients. The study will also investigate the safety and tolerability of sevelamer carbonate in study population and the effects of sevelamer carbonate on serum p-cresyl sulfate, indoxyl sulfate, LDL-C and uric acid.

primary_outcome.measure: Difference in the serum concentration of TMAO between treatment group and control group
primary_outcome.description: The serum concentration of TMAO will be evaluated by high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC)

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in the serum concentration of p-cresyl sulfate between treatment group and control group
secondary_outcome.description: The serum concentration of p-cresyl sulfate will be evaluated by high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC)

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in the serum concentration of indoxyl sulfate between treatment group and control group
secondary_outcome.description: The serum concentration of indoxyl sulfate will be evaluated by high performance liquid chromatography (HPLC)

secondary_outcome.measure: Difference in the serum concentration of LDL-C between treatment group and control group
Difference in the serum concentration of uric acid between treatment group and control group

arm_group.description: Sevelamer carbonate will be given with fixed dose of 1600mg (p.o. b.i.d) with meals

overall_official.affiliation: Division of nephrology, Nanfang Hospital Southern Medical University

facility.name: Renal Division, Nanfang Hospital,Southern Medical University
